snippet: Commissioner Roger Goodell told an audience at the Harvard School of Public Health that the N.F.L. was working hard to combat serious injuries, including those from hits to the head.
abstract: NFL commissioner Roger Goodell says league is working hard to combat serious injuries, including those from hits to head, but argues that players' mentality is part of injury problem.
lead_paragraph: Commissioner Roger Goodell told an audience at the Harvard School of Public Health that the N.F.L. was working hard to combat serious injuries, including those from hits to the head.

headline.seo: Roger Goodell, N.F.L. Commissioner, Speaks on Concussions
headline.main: Goodell Speaks of Changes Needed in N.F.L. Culture
headline.print_headline: Goodell Speaks of Changes Needed in N.F.L. Culture
